text: Meghan Markle ‘ s style has evolved dramatically since becoming a duchess — she wears midlength dresses and pantyhose, and even rocks a fascinator — but she ’ s made a surprise return to her roots. On Sunday, Meghan supported Prince Harry at the Audi Polo Challenge at Ascot ’ s Coworth Park Polo Club ( on what would have been Diana, Princess of Wales ’ s 57th birthday ), looking relaxed in a white button - down shirt from J. Crew, black cropped Everlane pants with matching Chanel flats, and a $ 58 Panama hat ( reportedly by Madewell x Biltmore ).
